astroGenerator.enable.description: Enable or disable the Astro File Generator extension

astroGenerator.files.include.description: Glob patterns to include in the package. The default is astro.

astroGenerator.files.exclude.description: Glob patterns to exclude from the package. The default is node_modules, dist, out, build, and any hidden files.

astroGenerator.files.showPath.description: Show the path of the file in the name of the list of generated files

astroGenerator.formatting.headerCommentT.description: Header comment template to add to the top of the generated file

astroGenerator.formatting.insertFinalNew.description: Insert a newline character at the end of the file
